那个倒计时提示呢。。

every 6 hours:
    broadcast "10"
    wait for 5 second
    broadcast "5"
    wait for 2 second
    broadcast "3"
    wait for 1 second
    broadcast "2"
    wait for 1 second
    broadcast "1"
    wait for 1 second
    console command "/stop"
